title: Romantic single-page Valentine prompt with playful dodging No button and Birthday reveal

requirements.text: Create a mobile-first, single-page romantic UI that displays the headline text exactly: "Pondati, will you be my Valentine?" and shows two clearly labeled buttons: "Yes" and "No".

quotes: ik romantic themed webpage for my girlfriend on webpage it should display like pondati will you be my valentine and there should be two options yes and no

acceptanceCriteria: On initial load, the page shows the exact headline text and two buttons labeled "Yes" and "No".
Layout is usable on common Android Chrome viewport sizes (e.g., 360x640 up to 412x915) without horizontal scrolling.

requirements.text: Implement a playful interaction for the "No" button: when the user attempts to interact with it (hover on desktop, pointer-down/tap on mobile), the button should move to a new random position within the visible safe area so it becomes difficult or impossible to click.

quotes: the no button should be playful whenever she try to click on no it should move or become unclickable and forcing her to click yes

acceptanceCriteria: Attempting to click/tap the "No" button causes it to reposition within the viewport (it should not move off-screen).
The "Yes" button remains stationary and easily clickable.
The interaction works on both desktop (mouse) and Android Chrome (touch).

requirements.text: When the user clicks "Yes", replace the main page content with a romantic reveal view and display the message text exactly as follows (with reasonable line breaks/paragraph styling): "Happy Birthday Pondati! I know you’re thinking that I forgot your birthday, but I didn’t. Thank you for everything. Thank you for loving me. Thank you for all the moments we have spent together. Be happy, stay healthy. Happy Birthday Pondati, my sweet potato!"

quotes: when she click yes there it should display happy birthday pondati I know you're thinking that I forgot your birthday but I didn't thankyouu for everything thankyouu for loving me thank you for all the moments we have spent together be happy stay healthy happy birthday pondati my sweet potato

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking "Yes" transitions to a new view state (or fully replaces the content) showing the full message text.
After clicking "Yes", the Valentine prompt and buttons are no longer the primary focus (hidden or clearly replaced).

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive romantic visual theme (not blue/purple) across the page: soft warm palette (pinks/reds/creams), elegant typography (including a cursive-style headline), subtle animations (e.g., floating hearts or gentle fade/scale transitions), and consistent spacing and alignment.
acceptanceCriteria: The UI uses a consistent romantic theme with warm colors and elegant typography.
Animations, if present, are subtle and do not obstruct reading or button interaction.
All text is legible with sufficient contrast on both the initial prompt and the reveal view.

requirements.text: Add the required generated images as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and use them in the UI (e.g., as background/texture) without routing images through the backend.

quotes: romantic collage background and a message

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and are referenced directly by the frontend.
The reveal view uses the romantic collage background image.
No backend endpoints are used for serving images.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text in the app.
Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them instead).
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, or `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Keep the project as a single-page experience; no additional pages/routes are required.
nonGoals: Backend canister data persistence or storage for this page.
Any third-party integrations (social APIs, email, SMS, etc.).

required: Romantic collage-style background with warm pink/red tones and soft bokeh hearts (valentine-collage-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Seamless subtle heart pattern texture, warm pink on cream (heart-pattern-tile.dim_512x512.png)
